collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Our Privacy Policy covers how we collect,
use, disclose, transfer, and store your information and customized user data.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
By using the websites, mobile applications or other service of Fotor
(hereinafter referred to as “Fotor Service” or “Service”), you acknowledge and
agree that you have consented to the collection, use, disclosure, transfer and
storage practices set out in this Privacy Policy.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
We use information collected
from cookies to improve users' experience and the overall quality of our
service.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
The use of a Clear GIF allows the service provider to measure the
actions of the visitor such as opening a page that contains the Clear GIF.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
1.6 “Face Data” collectively refers to (1) “input”: the original photos,
selfies and a specified gender that you submit to Service for purpose of
creating AI Avatars; and (2) “outcome”: the avatars created through AI
technology based on your face likeness.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Our Policy on Non-Personal Information

We may collect Non-Personal Information.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Non-personal data is collected, used,
transferred, disclosed and stored for a number of purposes.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
2.1 Cookies

2.1.1 We generally use Cookies for the following purposes: 1) to allow
registered users to stay logged in to the service after they close their
browser window; 2) to store users' preferences for Service functionality; 3)
to track Service usage so we can improve our service & better understand how
people are using it; and 4) to better understand the interests of our
customers and our Service visitors.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Analysis Cookies, among other things, collect information on how visitors use
our Service, the content and products that users view most frequently, and the
effectiveness of our third-party advertising.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
2.1.5 We may link the information collected by Cookies with other information
we collect from you pursuant to this Privacy Policy and use the combined
information as set forth herein.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Any information
that these third parties collect via Clear GIFs is generally not personally
identifiable (unless, for example, you provide personally identifiable
information to them through an ad or e-mail message).

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
2.3 Device Information or System Information﻿﻿

2.3.1 If you visit our Service through website or mobile application, we shall
receive and record the device related information you use (such as device
type, operating system and its version, device settings, device identifier,
time zone and language, software version number, browser unique identifier)
according to specific permissions you grant in the software installation and
use.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
2.3.2 The purposes of the Device Information or System Information includes:
1) identifying the user’s using habits; 2) automatically matching user’s
system language; 3) decision on service adaptation to some older devices or
systems; 4) helping developers locate the errors in the software; and 5)
improving the Service of website such as access speed etc.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
2.4 Log Data

We may save information about your registration or log in Fotor.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
We may
automatically record certain information about how you use our Service (we
refer to this information as “Log Data”).

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Log Data may include information
such as a user’s Internet Protocol (IP) address, date and time of
login/logout.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Our Policy on Personal Information (General)

3.1 Collection

When you use certain Fotor Service, we may require you to provide Personal
Information.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence: Personal Information may be collected in a number of ways.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Typically, we may prompt you to provide Personal Information that is necessary
for a certain Service to be performed.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
3.3 Use

3.3.1 If you use Fotor as a platform to sell or buy a license of copyright
protected works or to participate in any artwork competition, we may require
your personal information in order to identify you as the source of the
artistic work, in compliance with applicable laws.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
3.3.2 If you require us to contact you through a specific means of
communication, you need to provide for example your account identifier, name,
address/zip code, telephone number or email, according to the means of
communication that you have specified.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
3.3.3 If you agree to participate in our market research activities in order
to provide better Service for you and other users in the future, you may need
to provide some additional information (such as your gender, age, nature of
your organization, etc.)

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
3.3.4 When you use our customer support service, we collect your
correspondence in order to build up a public knowledge base, which will be
available to all users of the Service.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Our Policy on Face Data﻿

4.1 Collection  
  
The only case that we collect Face Data is when you use AI Avatar features.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
To implement this functionality, you will be
asked to upload 8 to 15 photos or selfies to Service and select a desired
gender of the avatar to be created.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
4.2.2 About Outcome  
  
Your outcome (avatar) will be stored on our servers (provided by Amazon Web
Services located in the USA) so that they remain accessible to you in the
service at any time until you decide to delete it.
